EmailTemplate.name: 201907_Global_GoDirectFlightPlanning_MC.201907_Global_Email_GoDirectFlightPlanni
EmailTemplate.subject: Flight Planning is now faster, easier and more accurate than ever before
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Greetings, Ready to experience GoDirect™ Flight Planning for yourself? You’re in good company, because more than 6,000 flight plans have been successfully filed using the new flight planning engine. Flight planning is now faster, easier to use and more accurate than ever before. It uses intuitive tools that you can access via website and the electronic flight bag. You'll have 24/7 access to real, live flight planning specialists and licensed dispatchers whenever you need them. Interested in some hands-on, dedicated training? Our flight operations team is here to walk you through the process and answer all of your questions.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/flight-planning]]>
